name: The Us vs. Them Split
description: Split screen comparison showing the 'Old Way' (struggle) vs 'New Way' (product solution).
example: Left side: messy cables. Right side: clean desk with wireless charger.

name: The iPhone Note Notification
description: An image that looks like an iOS notification or Notes app screenshot to trigger native reading behavior.
example: A Reminder notification saying 'Don't forget to buy mom a gift'.

name: The Founders Selfie
description: Low-fi, authentic looking selfie of the founder holding the product with a humble caption.
example: Founder holding the energy drink in a warehouse.

name: The Chart of Truth
description: A simple bar chart or checkmark list showing your product winning against 'Others'.
example: Green checkmarks for your features, red X for competitors.

name: The Texture Macro
description: Extreme close-up of the product texture to induce sensory response.
example: Fizz bubbling on the soda can lip.
